title: Microsoft art gallery (PC)
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
description: Presenting the celebrated art collection of the National Gallery, London. Take a guided tour of the incredible highlights of this lauded collection, with vivid colour, animation and sound. View and learn about the works of the great masters such as Titian, Monet, Turner and Michaelangelo. Whether you are a casual browser or a serious student, from the delicate line of da Vinci to the blazing sworls of van Gogh, you'll find inspiration and information. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: a multimedia PC or compatible; 386SX or higher microprocessor; 4 Mb of RAM; 1 Mb of avalable disk space; audio board; VGA+ 256-colour display; CD-ROM drive; Microsoft Windows 3.1 or later; MS-DOS 3.1 or late; Microsoft mouse or compatible pointing device; headphones or speakers.
